name: 威尔·博泽尔
introduction: William Bozier is an actor, known for Beauty and the Beast (2017) and Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again (2018). Swan Lake (2019)Will trained at Tring Park School for the Performing Arts and joined New Adventures in 2014.Theatre includes Ivan Boleslawsky and Anton in Matthew Bourne’s The Red Shoes, King Benedict and Lord Rupert in Matthew Bourne’s Sleeping Beauty, Brad and Chase Covitt in Matthew Bourne’s Edward Scissorhands; ensemble in Wicked (Apollo Victoria, London), cover Eddie in Mamma Mia! (International Tour) and dancer alongside West End leading lady Kerry Ellis in The Great British Songbook (Shaw Theatre).Film includes Stable Boy in Disney’s Beauty and the Beast (2017), University Student in Mamma Mia!, and Here We Go Again, due for release in 2019.
